dtliExcerpt: Menzel does get to do some gravity-defying climbing—the Bay Area–based troupe Bandaloop provided the show’s “vertical choreography”—and show off her impressive, rangey voice. But all the vocal pyrotechnics on Broadway can’t help this Redwood grow.

keyPhrases.quote: show off her impressive, rangey voice
all the vocal pyrotechnics on Broadway can't help this Redwood grow
all the vocal pyrotechnics on Broadway can’t help this Redwood grow

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Despite praising Menzel's vocals and physical performance, the critic's final verdict that even her talents 'can't help this Redwood grow' signals fundamental problems with the show that outweigh individual strengths. | GPT-4o-mini: The review highlights some positive aspects of the performance but ultimately conveys a strong sense of disappointment with the overall production, leading to a negative recommendation.
